content.raw: Thanks for the submission @{5d290e4286bc8c0c4b44140d} . However, the submission is not correct yet, please review the [phase 1 submission process](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/events/19/phase1_helloworld) instructions. You only need to commit a text file named `video_link.txt` with the URI to your video. Feel free to update your pull request.
content.html: Thanks for the submission @Jordan . However, the submission is not correct yet, please review the phase 1 submission process instructions. You only need to commit a text file named video_link.txt with the URI to your video. Feel free to update your pull request.
